text:
Eu: Ok!
Primeira coisa que fiz ao fechar o chat com Natasha foi apagar a foto que meu filho postou. Louis adorava fotos, por algum motivo desconhecido por mim, já que eu sequer tirava tantas fotos assim, isso era trabalho da minha mãe. A foto estava surpreendentemente boa, mas apaguei da mesma forma, não gostava de expor minha vida na internet.
Rose dormiu pouco tempo depois, eu quem havia feito um plantão de trinta e seis horas, mas ela quem estava exausta e dormiu feito pedra na primeira chance que teve, então a levei até o berço e a deitei lá, ligando a babá eletrônica para caso de imprevistos. Louis ainda estava acordado, esperando por mim na sala para que eu terminasse de assistir o episódio de patrulha canina com ele.
— Mamãe...- A voz do meu filho soou assim que ele me viu descendo as escadas. — A mana mimiu?
trans:
Me: Okay!
The first thing I did after closing the chat with Natasha was delete the photo my son had posted. Louis loved taking photos, for reasons I couldn't quite understand, since I wasn't much of a photographer myself, that was my mom's job. The photo was surprisingly good, but I deleted it anyway. I wasn't comfortable exposing my life on the internet.
Rose fell asleep shortly after. Despite me working a thirty-six-hour shift, she was the one who was utterly exhausted and slept like a rock the moment she had the chance. I gently placed her in her crib, turned on the baby monitor, and made sure everything was in place in case anything unexpected happened. Louis was still awake, waiting for me in the living room so we could finish watching the Paw Patrol episode together.
─ Mommy... - My son's voice echoed as soon as he saw me coming down the stairs. ─ Is my sister sleeping?
